content: Is there a tracking issue or any work done on adding an assist for moving code to a different module? It can be very time consuming moving a type (along with any impl blocks) or functions to different modules and resolving imports. It would be fantastic if this could be automated.
@Florian Diebold I remember you suggesting some kind of cool UX here, like "the user writes the destination module in a comment", or something like this. Do you remember what issue that was?
don't remember the issue, but I think my idea was a 'move item here' assist for imports, so you'd write a use other_module::Item; and apply the assist?

Yea I think rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer#2178 is the closest to what I meant (as I really want to move items from somewhere to an existing place (as opposed to creating a new module from items). It would be nice if we had some UI capabilities that are more powerful than just the assist UI...
